main event: A circular object, about 4,400 pounds in weight, with a bright or slightly reflecting color, suddenly accelerated and shot vertically into the sky at a high rate of speed. The object was observed for 10-15 seconds during the daytime and there was no sound reported.
interesting points: The object was at an elevation of about 70 degrees.
There was no physical evidence found.
The conclusion of the incident was classified as 'Undisclosed'.
sighted object: circular object, about 4,400 pounds in weight, with a bright or slightly reflecting color
